dmca.title: DMCA - Eberle
dmca.body:
Attorneys at Law
Wiesner

Rechtsanwalt Achim Wisener, Praunheimer Landstr, 32, 60488 Frankfurtam Main

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheater Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
USA


Fax 001 (650) 963-3255


Sent per copy via email:
removals@google.com

Attorney at Law Achim Wiesner
LL.M. (Harvard Law School)
Attorney at Law Uwe Lipphardt
Attorney at Law Christiane Kurz
Attorney at Law Princess of Hohenlohe Jagstberg
Attorney at Law Petra Kyaw
Attorney at Law Sybille Schaar
Admitted to practice at all German District and County Courts
Postal Address:
Praunheimer Landstr. 32
60488 Frankfurt am Main
Germany
Telephone +49 (69) 7474-3920
+49 (69) 7474-3921
Facsimile +49 (69) 7474-3922
Mobile +49 (172) 8 70 60 70
info@rechtsanwalt-wiesner.de

Friday, 16. March 2007

Re: Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA)


Dear Sir or Madam,

my client Mr. Faustus Eberle received information that the following listed domain, which appears to be on servers under your control, is offering inlicensed copies of, or is engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to copyrighted computer programs published by my client


1. Identification of copyrighted works:

FaustusEberle Managertest Version 1.04

Copyright owner: Mr Faustus Eberle, Bellevueweg 40, 6300 Zug, Switzerland


2. Copyright

Google Search Query:  ,,Faustus Eberle"

Infringing Web Pages: http://www.gomopa.net/Finanzforum/Themen-die-fuer-Wirbel-sorgten/ifpf-de-autotester24-reisen4free-EUROPE-Media-AG-Seite-6.html

http://www.gomopa.net/Finanzforum/Themen-diefuer-Wirbel-sorgten/ifpf-de-autotester24-reisen4freeEUROPE-Media-AG-Seite-5.html

http://www.gomopa.net/Finanzforum/Themen-diefuer-Wirbel-sorgten/ifpf-de-autotester24-reisen4freeEUROPE-Media-AG.html

The above location is offering a Product Key, intended to circumvent technical measures that control access to my clients copyrighted work.

3. Statement of authority:

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that the information in this notice is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of Mr Eberle, the owner of the copyright(s) in the work(s) identified above. I have a good faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed above have been authorized by my client, its agents, or the law.

We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you take expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material described above, and thereby prevent the unauthorized distribution of these cracks and product keys via your company's network.

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us regarding what actions you take.

Yours sincerely,

Rechtsanwalt
Attorney at Law, LL.M. (Harvard Law School)
